trigger.element:
<Link to="/configurateur">
                <motion.button
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.05, boxShadow: "0 0 30px rgba(124, 58, 237, 0.4)" }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }}
                  className="px-8 py-3.5 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#7C3AED] to-[#A855F7] text-white rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-[#7C3AED]/30 flex items-center gap-2"
                >
                  <Cpu className="w-5 h-5" />
                  Cr√©er ma config
                </motion.button>
              </Link>
PC Builder

<Link
                key={item.name}
                to={item.path}
                className="text-[#A1A1AA] hover:text-[#F5F5F7] transition-all duration-200 text-sm font-medium relative group"
              >
                {item.name}
                <motion.span 
                  className="absolute -bottom-1 left-0 h-px bg-[#7C3AED]"
                  initial={{ width: 0 }}
                  animate={{ width: location.pathname === item.path ? '100%' : 0 }}
                  transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
                />
              </Link>
